name: Pirate Captain
story: You are the captain of The Black Pearl, a legendary pirate ship. Your crew has just docked at Tortuga, a notorious pirate haven. Adventure and treasure await as you explore the Caribbean during the Golden Age of Piracy.

Tortuga.name: Tortuga
Tortuga.description: A bustling pirate port filled with taverns, traders, and trouble.

blocked_exits.north: The British Navy patrols this area.

British Docks.name: British Docks
British Docks.description: A heavily guarded area where British ships are docked.

exits.open sea: The open sea. It calls to a pirate's heart.

blocked_exits.open sea: Pirates don't swim well, and the British Navy is always on the lookout.

items: wanted poster with a handsome scoundrel's face

Black Pearl.name: Black Pearl
Black Pearl.description: Your ship, moored at the docks, ready for the next voyage.

exits.open sea: The open sea. It calls to a pirate's heart.

blocked_exits.open sea: The Black Pearl is not seaworthy until it is repaired.

Captain's Cabin.name: Captain's Cabin
Captain's Cabin.description: Your personal quarters on the ship, filled with maps and treasures.

Sleepy Mermaid.name: Sleepy Mermaid
Sleepy Mermaid.description: A rowdy inn filled with pirates and rumors of treasure.

Tortuga Market.name: Tortuga Market
Tortuga Market.description: A bustling market filled with merchants, pirates, and rare goods. The air is thick with the scent of spices and the sound of haggling.

inventory: Davey's half of the treasure map
Calypso's half of the treasure map

Davey.name: Davey
Davey.description: A grizzled old pirate with a wooden leg. Fellow captain and sometimes ally.
items: Davey's half of the treasure map

Gibbs.name: Gibbs
Gibbs.description: Your loyal first mate with a keen sense of duty.

Calypso.name: Calypso
Calypso.description: A bartender at the Sleepy Mermaid, known for her enchanting stories and elusive nature.
items: Calypso's half of the treasure map

Shipwright.name: Shipwright
Shipwright.description: A burly shipwright who will repair your ship. He requires a ship repair ledger to begin the work, and a payment of 500 gold doubloons to complete the repairs.

Charming Marvin.name: Charming Marvin
Charming Marvin.description: A merchant who deals in common items necessary for life at sea. Unpleasant smell and unpleasant demeanor, but has what you need.

contingency_prompts: When the player first enters the Sleepy Mermaid, Calypso greets him.
Calypso never leaves the Sleepy Mermaid, so the player must find her there.
Davey never enters the story until after the player has received Calypso's half of the treasure map.
Allow the player to access the British Docks through creative in-world solutions only.
The shipwright can begin work for a small deposit, but require payment of 500 gold doubloons to complete the repairs.
The chest on the British Docks is too heavy for one person to carry.
contingency_rules: Only when the player meets Calypso, set the var `calypso_met` to `true`.
Only when the player accesses British Docks, remove `north` from `blocked_exits` in the Tortuga location. Set var `british_docks_accessed` to `true`.
Only when the player successfully accesses the gold doubloons, add 510 gold doubloons to inventory. Do not add the chest.
Only when the player asks the shipwright to start repairs on the Black Pearl, set `black_pearl_repairs_started` to true and remove the ship repair ledger from inventory.
Only when the player pays the shipwright 500 gold doubloons, set `blacksmith_paid` to true and remove the 500 gold doubloons from inventory.

Only when the player's inventory contains both Calypso's half and Davey's half of the treasure map, set `treasure_map_assembled` to true. Also remove both halves from inventory and add 'assembled treasure map'.
The game ends when the following are complete: `treasure_map_assembled` is true, `black_pearl_repairs_started` is true, and `blacksmith_paid` is true.
opening_prompt: You stand on the bustling docks of Tortuga, the salty air thick with the promise of adventure. Your crew awaits your orders, and the Black Pearl is ready to set sail. What will you do next?
